project_descr: The overriding objective of the new SELAJSI Programme is to strengthen access to justice and the enforcement of law while simultaneously supporting the foundations for longer-term social integration (SI) and development. This Project will focus on SI.

outputs.output_descr: The overriding objective of the new Programme is to strengthen access to justice and the enforcement of law while simultaneously supporting the foundations for longer-term social integration and development.
